Header: One killed and two injured following a mine collapse in Nivithigala
Content: One person died and two others sustained injuries following a gem mine collapse in Madara area in Nivithigala – Ratnapura. The deceased is a 34 year old resident of Madara – Nivithigala. The two injured were admitted to Ratnapura hospital and a spokesperson at the hospital stated that their condition is not critical. It is reported that the mine was operating illegally in a privately owned property.
